<id>;https://pr.tsmc.com/english/news/3049</id>; <更新>;2023-08-08T10:50:53.917049Z</更新>; <link href="https://pr.tsmc.com/english/news/3049"/>; <作者>; <名称>;king_phil</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=king_phil</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">; <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/ #tsmc-bosch-infineon-and-nxp-to-build-fab-in-germany" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item ?id=37047053" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <标题type="text">;通过 JavaScript 运行时堆快照进行网页抓取 (2022)</stitle>; <id>;https://www.adriancooney.ie/blog/web-scraping-via-javascript-heap-snapshots</id>; <更新>;2023-08-08T12:50:54.031773Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.adriancooney.ie/blog/web-scraping-via-javascript-heap-snapshots"/>; <作者>; <name>;djooldman</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=djooldman</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https: //images.ctfassets.net/npzloj4jufpj/75qpL277gPtRwaC5CwsRP0/8c33286899e153ba9c6020e79311ff16/paris-night-rawscan.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 170px;" />;<br />;由于 Web 技术的进步以及大公司为保护数据所做的努力，Web 抓取变得更加困难。但是，已经开发了一种使用 JavaScript 运行时堆快照的新技术来自动化从封闭平台提取数据的过程。这种技术降低了网络抓取工具的维护成本，并且具有潜在的面向未来的能力。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#web-scraping-via-javascript-runtime -heap-snapshots-2022" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37047746" target="_blank">;[评论] </a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Magic Earth：基于 OSM 的地图和路线包含众包流量数据</stitle>; <id>;https://www.magicearth.com/crowd-sourced-traffic/</id>; <updated>;2023-08-08T11:50:54.033822Z</updated>; < link href="https://www.magicearth.com/crowd-sourced-traffic/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;executesorder66</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id =executesorder66</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.magicearth.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/11/Traffic-faster-route2.png “样式=”宽度：220px;高度：109px;" />;<br />;击败流量。通过与我们先进的路由引擎集成的最新众包流量，为您的家人节省令人沮丧的时刻。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat .io/#magic-earth-osm-based-map-and-routing-with-crowd-sourced-traffic-data" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https:// news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37047304" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/ feed.xml">; <title type="text">;中土世界的海军</stitle>; <id>;https://warfantasy.wordpress.com/2023/07/02/navy-in-middle-earth/< /id>; <更新>;2023-08-08T12:50:54.036262Z</更新>; <link href="https://warfantasy.wordpress.com/2023/07/02/navy-in-middle-earth/" />; <author>; <name>;aldarion</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=aldarion</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src =“https://warfantasy.files.wordpress.com/2023/07/2e513-main-qimg-73d4fff62f2dafa23a33f1a6485123bd-c.jpg”样式=“宽度：220px；高度：156px;" />;<br />;海军和海军行动在托尔金的中土世界中扮演着重要的角色，费艾诺的精灵使用船只前往中土世界，而刚铎则与乌姆巴尔的海盗们抗衡。努门诺掌握了第二纪元的大海，沉没后，幸存的流放者航行到世界各地。托尔金作品中提到的船只包括高桅帆船、天鹅船和桨帆船。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/ #navy-in-middle-earth" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37048099" target="_blank">;[ comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;排版：定义和渲染器对于 ASCII 图表</stitle>; <id>;https://google.github.io/typograms/</id>; <updated>;2023-08-08T10:50:54.038221Z</updated>; <link href="https: //google.github.io/typograms/"/>; <author>; <name>;sgoto</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=sgoto</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;Typograms 是一种轻量级图像格式，用于在技术文档中定义简单图表。它以牺牲表现力和人体工程学为代价来优化可编辑性和可移植性。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#typograms-a-definition-and-renderer-for-ascii-diagrams" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href=" https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37040883" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews. betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;亚马逊不“雇佣”​​司机，而是雇佣公司来阻止他们加入工会</stitle>; <id>;https://www.vice.com /en/article/qjv3yp/amazon-says-it-doesnt-employ-drivers-but-records-show-it-hired-firms-to-prevent-them-from-unionizing</id>; <更新>;2023-08 -08T13:26:54.039114Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.vice.com/en/article/qjv3yp/amazon-says-it-doesnt-employ-drivers-but-records-show- it-hired-firms-to-prevent-them-from-unionizing"/>; <author>; <name>;rntn</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=rntn</uri >; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://video-images.vice.com/articles/64cd38a13463f3585bdc2195/lede/1691171494998-gettyimages-1245075409.jpeg?image-resize-opts= Y3JvcD0xeHc6MC44NDI4eGg7MHh3LDAuMTEwNnhoJnJlc2l6ZT0xMjAwOiomcmVzaXplPTEyMDA6Kg"样式=“宽度：220px； height: 124px;" />;<br />;亚马逊聘请了反对工会的咨询公司，以阻止其司机加入国际卡车司机兄弟会。提交给劳工部的报告显示，亚马逊在反工会咨询上花费了超过 1,420 万美元2022 年。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#amazon-doesn-t-employ-drivers-but-hired-firms-to-prevent-them-from-unionizing" target="_blank" >;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37048637" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;亚历山大钢琴</stitle>; <id>;https://www.alexanderpiano.nz/页面/the-alexander-piano</id>; <更新>;2023-08-08T04:50:54.039922Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.alexanderpiano.nz/page/the-alexander-piano "/>; <作者>; <名称>;KolmogorovComp </名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=KolmogorovComp</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src =“https://www.alexanderpiano.nz/images/466305/20180511_171954.jpg”样式=“宽度：220px;高度：124px;" />;<br />;探索 20 岁的年轻人在有限的帮助和经验下制造的最长的钢琴。建于新西兰蒂马鲁<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/# the-alexander-piano" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37032286" target="_blank">;[评论]< /a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Noclip.website：视频数字博物馆游戏关卡</stitle>; </author>; <content type="html">;数字博物馆视频游戏关卡<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#noclip-website-a-digital-museum-of-video-game-levels" target="_blank">;[summary]</a >; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37043934" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base=" https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;闪光的并非金子——效仿古希腊世界的奢华</stitle>; <id>;https://www. britishmuseum.org/blog/all-glitters-not-gold-emulated-luxury-ancient-greek-world</id>; <更新>;2023-08-08T09:50:54.041636Z</更新>; <link href="https ://www.britishmuseum.org/blog/all-glitters-not-gold-emulated-luxury-ancient-greek-world"/>; <author>; <name>;diodorus</name>; <uri>;https://news .ycombinator.com/user?id=diodorus</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.britishmuseum.org/sites/default/files/styles/uncropped_large /public/2023-07/Urn%20extra%20black%201600px.jpg?itok=-Hrl_C5u" style="宽度：220px;高度：179px;" />;<br />;古希腊人渴望获得受波斯同行启发的昂贵物品，但总是买不起最好的材料。他们用拟物化的方法，用价格实惠的粘土和黑釉陶器上的镀金图案来模仿金属器皿. <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#all-that-glitters-is-not-gold-emulated-luxury-in-the-ancient-greek-world" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37044567" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;安息吧 Bram Moolenaar，Vim 的作者</stitle>; <id>;https://arstechnica。 com/gadgets/2023/08/bram-moolenaar-creator-of-the-beloved-vim-text-editor-has-passed-away/</id>; <更新>;2023-08-08T13:33:54.042420Z< /updated>; <link href="https://arstechnica.com/gadgets/2023/08/bram-moolenaar-creator-of-the-beloved-vim-text-editor-has-passed-away/"/>; <作者>; <name>;nixgeek</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=nixgeek</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https ://cdn.arstechnica.net/wp-content/uploads/2023/08/Bram_Moolenaar_in_2007_cropped-800x499.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 138px;" />;<br />;Vim 的作者 Bram Moolenaar 去世，享年 62 岁。他将一生的大部分时间奉献给了 Vim，并为 Vim 社区感到自豪。 <a href=" https://hackernews.betacat.io/#rest-in-peace-bram-moolenaar-author-of-vim" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;构建 Alex Taradov 的开源 USB 嗅探器</stitle>; <id>;https://www.downtowndougbrown .com/2023/08/building-alex-taradovs-open-source-usb-sniffer/</id>; <更新>;2023-08-08T08:50:54.043191Z</更新>; <link href="https:// /www.downtowndougbrown.com/2023/08/building-alex-taradovs-open-source-usb-sniffer/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;zdw </名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator。 com/user?id=zdw</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.downtowndougbrown.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/08/DS1Z_QuickPrint4。 png" 样式="宽度:220px; height: 132px;" />;<br />;Alex Taradov 创建了一款廉价的开源 USB 2.0 嗅探器，组装零件成本约为 50 美元。它与 Wireshark 集成，为昂贵的 USB 嗅探器提供了更便宜的替代品。<a href= “https://hackernews.betacat.io/#building-alex-taradovs-open-source-usb-sniffer” target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news. ycombinator.com/item?id=37027909" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed. xml">; <title type="text">;恶性黑色素瘤利用优雅的分子机制来逃避免疫反应</stitle>; <id>;https://www.cancer.columbia.edu/news/cancers-cloaking-device-revealed< /id>; <更新>;2023-08-08T00:50:54.043955Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.cancer.columbia.edu/news/cancers-cloaking-device-revealed"/>; <作者>; <name>;geox</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=geox</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https ://www.cancer.columbia.edu/sites/default/files/styles/cola_media_1280_16_9/public/media/images/teaser/2023-07/teaser_1680_x_945_px_5.png?itok=LdntLX6Z" style="width: 220px; height: 124px;" />;<br />;恶性黑色素瘤是一种危险的皮肤癌，它利用一种优雅的分子机制来逃避自然免疫反应和旨在增强免疫反应的疗法。研究结果解释了这些肿瘤如何抵抗治疗，并提出了新的建议攻击这种癌症和可能其他类型癌症的策略。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#malignant-melanoma-deploys-elegant-molecular-mechanism-to-evade-immune-responses" target=" _blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37042790" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </条目>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;谢尔顿·布朗的自行车技术信息</stitle>; <id>;https://www. sheldonbrown.com/</id>; <更新>;2023-08-08T02:50:54.044729Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.sheldonbrown.com/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;thunderbong </name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=thunderbong</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;有关此网站消亡的报道过于夸张！ sheldonbrown.com 感谢 Harris Cyclery 多年来的支持。哈里斯自行车店已经关闭，但我们仍在继续。继续访问该网站以获取新的和更新的文章，以及有关可能的新隶属关系的新闻。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#sheldon-brown-s-bicycle-technical-info" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https:// news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37019396" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/ feed.xml">; <title type="text">;理查德·斯卡里收藏：Archive.org</stitle>; <id>;https://archive.org/search?query=Richard+Scarry&and%5B%5D=subject%3A %22Richard+Scarry%22</id>; <更新>;2023-08-08T05:50:54.045564Z</更新>; <link href="https://archive.org/search?query=Richard+Scarry&and%5B% 5D=subject%3A%22Richard+Scarry%22"/>; <author>; <name>;getwiththeprog</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=getwiththeprog</uri>; </author >; <content type="html">; <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#richard-scarry-collection-archive-org" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37044673" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https:// /hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Jim Keller 和他在芯片设计和架构方面的开创性工作</stitle>; <id>;https://www.edn.com/the-吉姆凯勒和他的开创性工作芯片设计和架构的故事/</id>; <更新>;2023-08-08T05:50:54.046336Z</更新>; <link href ="https://www.edn.com/the-story-of-jim-keller-and-his-pioneering-work-on-chip-design-and-architecture/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;xrayarx </name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=xrayarx</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.edn .com/wp-content/uploads/Alpha_21164_EV5_microprocessor_700.png?fit=742%2C565" style="width: 220px; height: 168px;" />;<br />;必要的 cookie 对于网站的基本功能和安全功能至关重要。功能 cookie 启用某些功能，例如共享内容和收集反馈。性能 cookie 分析网站性能以获得更好的用户体验。分析 cookie 跟踪访问者互动。广告 cookie 提供相关广告。正在分析其他未分类的 cookie。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#jim-keller-and-his-pioneering-work-on-chip-design- and-architecture" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37011282" target="_blank">;[评论]</a >;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;在 ChromeOS 上运行 Firefox</stitle>; <id>; https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/run-firefox-chromeos</id>; <更新>;2023-08-08T04:50:54.047095Z</更新>; <link href="https:// /support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/run-firefox-chromeos"/>; <作者>; <名称>;nateb2022</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=nateb2022 </uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://assets-prod.sumo.prod.webservices.mozgcp.net/static/volunteer.a3be8d331849774b.png" style="宽度：220px； height: 210px;" />;<br />;Firefox 现在可以安装在 Chromebook 和其他运行 ChromeOS 的设备上。本文介绍了系统要求和设置过程。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/# run-firefox-on-chromeos" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37044625" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;监控日志主要是一个 tarpit </stitle>; <id>;https://utcc.utoronto.ca/~cks/space/blog/sysadmin/LogMonitoringTarpit</id>; <更新>;2023-08-08T05:50:54.047905Z</更新>; <link href="https://utcc.utoronto.ca/~cks/space/blog/sysadmin/LogMonitoringTarpit"/>; <作者>; <名称>;signa11</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/ user?id=signa11</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;监控日志通常是不值得的。日志的非结构化性质使得很难区分信号和噪音，并且监控特定信号需要了解它们的外观以及随时间变化的情况。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#monitoring-your-logs-is-mostly-a-tarpit" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https: //news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37044820" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat. io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;类 LK-99 合成样品的铁磁半悬浮</stitle>; <id>;https://arxiv.org/abs/2308.03110</id>; <更新>;2023-08-08T01:50:54.048708Z</updated>; <link href="https://arxiv.org/abs/2308.03110"/>; <author>; <name>;platz</name>; <uri>;https: //news.ycombinator.com/user?id=platz</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://static.arxiv.org/static/browse/0.3. 4/images/arxiv-logo-fb.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：129px；" />;<br />;我们采用固相烧结法成功合成了类LK-99多晶陶瓷样品。这些样品普遍含有微弱但确定的软铁磁成分，这解释了在强垂直磁场中观察到的半悬浮现象。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#ferroMagnetic-half-levitation-of-lk-99-like-synthetic-samples" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href ="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37043447" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https:// hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;最持久的白炽灯泡</stitle>; <id>;https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Longest- permanent_light_bulbs</id >; <更新>;2023-08-08T08:50:54.049575Z</更新>; <link href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Longest- permanent_light_bulbs"/>; <作者>; <名称>;维吉尔</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=Vigier</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://upload.wikimedia.org /wikipedia/commons/thumb/f/f7/Mangumlightbulb.jpg/220px-Mangumlightbulb.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：165px；" />;<br />;世界上最长寿的灯泡是位于加利福尼亚州利弗莫尔的 Centennial Light。它已经燃烧了至少 121 年，只被关闭过几次。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#longest- permanent-incandescent-light-bulbs" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news. ycombinator.com/item?id=37004567" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed. xml">; <title type="text">;《蒙娜丽莎失窃案》（2000）</stitle>; <id>;https://www.pbs.org/treasuresoftheworld/a_nav/mona_nav/main_monafrm.html</id>; <更新>;2023-08-08T01:50:54.050377Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.pbs.org/treasuresoftheworld/a_nav/mona_nav/main_monafrm.html"/>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37030338" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text" >;启动 HN：GitStart (YC S19) – 远程初级开发人员处理生产 PR</stitle>; <id>;https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37033753</id>; <更新>;2023-08- 07T13:50:54.052033Z</updated>; <link href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37033753"/>; <author>; <name>;hzia</name>; <uri>;https:// /news.ycombinator.com/user?id=hzia</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;GitStart 是一项供工程团队分配票证并取回 PR 的服务。他们招募远程初级开发人员来处理这些票证并审查彼此的 PR。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#launch-hn-gitstart-yc-s19-remote-junior-devs-working-on-production-prs" target="_blank">;[摘要]< /a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37033753" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base ="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;拉斯维加斯批准修建 68 英里的地下交通隧道</stitle>; <id>;https://www.reviewjournal.com /local/traffic/las-vegas-approves-68-miles-of-underground-transportation-tunnels-2874498/</id>; <更新>;2023-08-08T11:50:54.053815Z</更新>; <link href= “https://www.reviewjournal.com/local/traffic/las-vegas-approves-68-miles-of-underground-transportation-tunnels-2874498/”/>; <作者>; <名称>;pantalaimon</名称>; < uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=pantalaimon</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.reviewjournal.com/wp- content/uploads/2023/07/18011555_web1_WOC-JUN09-21-016.jpg?crop=1" style="宽度：220px；高度：142px；" />;<br />;埃隆·马斯克 (Elon Musk) 旗下的 Boring Company 已获得扩建拉斯维加斯地下交通系统的批准。该系统将设有 81 个车站和 68 英里的隧道，其中 21 个车站位于城市边界内。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#las-vegas-approves-68-miles-of-underground-transportation-tunnels" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href ="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37033569" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https:// hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;我宁愿看到我的书被盗版，也不愿看到这个</stitle>; <id>;https://janefriedman.com/i-would-rather- see-my-books-pierated/</id>; <更新>;2023-08-08T00:50:54.054838Z</更新>; <link href="https://janefriedman.com/i-would-rather-see- my-books-pierated/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;ilamont</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=ilamont</uri>; </author>; <内容类型= "html">;<img src="https://janefriedman.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/08/amazon_goodreads_AI-blogpost-1000x667.png" style="宽度：220 像素；高度：147 像素；" />;<br />;人工智能生成的书籍被上传到亚马逊和 Goodreads，并附有作者姓名，引起了沮丧和担忧。作者无法轻易删除这些误导性书籍，并呼吁更好地验证作者身份和阻止欺诈性书籍的能力。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#i-would-rather-see-my-books-get-pierated-than-this" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; < a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37042561" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https: //hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;墨西哥寻求巩固美国最大贸易伙伴的地位，进一步超越中国</stitle>; <id>;https://www.dallasfed .org/research/economics/2023/0711</id>; <更新>;2023-08-08T08:50:54.055653Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.dallasfed.org/research/economics/ 2023/0711"/>; <作者>; <名称>;伊顿菲尔</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=eatonphil</uri>; </作者>; <内容类型=“html” >;<img src="https://www.dallasfed.org/research/economics/2023/~/media/Images/research/economics/2023/0711/dfe0711c1.png" style="宽度：220 像素；高度：130 像素;” />;<br />;墨西哥2023年超过中国成为美国第一大贸易伙伴。这一转变受到中美贸易紧张局势和疫情造成的供应链中断的影响。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#mexico-seeks-to-solidify-rank-as-top-us-trade-partner-push-further-past-china" target="_blank">; [摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37046128" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <条目 xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Raku：小精灵的语言</stitle>; <id>;https://buttondown.email/ hillelwayne/archive/raku-a-language-for-gremlins/</id>; <更新>;2023-08-07T20:50:54.056440Z</更新>; <link href="https://buttondown.email/hillelwayne/ archive/raku-a-language-for-gremlins/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;azhenley</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=azhenley</uri>; </作者>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://image-generator.buttondown.email/api/emphasize-subject?subject=Raku:%20A%20Language%20for%20Gremlins&author=Computer%20Things&date= 2023-08-07&img=“样式=”宽度：220像素；高度：116像素；“ />;<br />;我添加了一个新的部分来学习如何优化 TLA+ 模型检查。我一直在学习 Raku 作为一种潜在的“计算器语言”，它有许多独特的功能。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#raku-a-language-for-gremlins" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news. ycombinator.com/item?id=37040681" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; </feed>;
